name: A Clockwork Ley-Line: The Borderline of Dusk
description: In a mysterious school where day and night are two separate worlds, a mismatched trio work to resolve magic-related incidents. A world of magic, intrigue, mystery and the occult awaits you!
minimum_requirements: OS: XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Pentium4 1.3GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space
